messagesOnSuccess: Good morning, Handyman. Doesn't earth look dashing today?
Why don't you go out for a walk and get some fresh air?
As you might've heard, we caught a large asteroid last night.
Its massive size caused quite a bit of a mess.
It damaged a lot of our equipment nearby.
So we'll need you to go to an adjacent mining site and bring it back online.

messagesOnRejection: Ah, the airlock is jammed. I suppose you'll need a wrench.
